definition: resembling or made of or suggestive of flowers
details:
adjective
- resembling or made of or suggestive of flowers
= example: resembling or made of or suggestive of flowers
= synonyms: flowered
- of or relating to the plant life in a particular region
= example: of or relating to the plant life in a particular region
- relating to or associated with flowers
= example: relating to or associated with flowers
